attributes.action: Please stop the deportation of the young man with Aspergers syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am startled and very distressed at the possibility of the young man with Aspergers syndrome being deported to the USA. I have a grandson with this awful disability and they are not able to cope with such traumas to their life.  They have a profound belief in justice and are single minded in trying to solve problems.  He is no threat to the USA.  It is a bullying and a very cowardly response by the UK.  It must not happen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
